entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
